casebody.data:
MOUNTAINDALE CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, INC. v. JOSEPH ZAPPONE ET AL. James W. Oliver and David R. Levesque, in support of the petition. Michael C. Deakin and William C. Berry, in opposition. Decided October 31, 2000

MCDONALD, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
